title: Python Online
description: A web-based Python learning platform with interactive coding exercises, real-time code execution, and progress tracking for aspiring developers.
imageAlt: Python code on a screen with colorful syntax highlighting

title: PaperMind
description: A document digitization application with PDF to searchable PDF conversion, OCR, and Intelligent file naming based on content and cloud storage integration.

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: A sentiment analysis logistics regression model trained on the twitter sentiment140 dataset with a streamlit User Interface for easy access

title: Auto MPG Predictor
description: A Machine Learning model to predict the MPG of a car based on its features, trained on the Auto MPG dataset.
